git_ops module

Git Operations Module

Git operation handlers for GitHub repositories using GitPython.

Main Features:

  • clone_repo: Clone repository (with token authentication)

  • pull_repo: Pull latest changes

  • list_files: List files/directories

  • read_file: Read file content

  • search_files: Search filenames/content

  • get_commits: Get commit history

  • get_branches: Get branch list

  • checkout_branch: Switch branches

Dependencies:

  • GitPython: Python library for Git operations

Repository Path Structure:

/repos/{user_id}/{repo_name}/

Environment Variables:

  • REPOS_PATH: Repository base path (default: /repos)

예제

>>> from git_ops import clone_repo, get_commits
>>> result = clone_repo(
...     "https://github.com/user/repo.git",
...     "ghp_xxx",
...     "12345",
...     "my-repo"
... )
>>> commits = get_commits("12345", "my-repo", max_count=10)
git_ops.REPOS_BASE_PATH: str = '/repos'

Base path for cloned repositories. Loaded from REPOS_PATH environment variable.

Type:

str

git_ops.BINARY_EXTENSIONS: set = {'.a', '.avi', '.dll', '.dylib', '.eot', '.exe', '.gif', '.gz', '.ico', '.jpeg', '.jpg', '.mov', '.mp3', '.mp4', '.o', '.pdf', '.png', '.pyc', '.so', '.tar', '.ttf', '.wav', '.webm', '.woff', '.woff2', '.zip'}

Set of file extensions considered binary. These files are skipped during content search and not returned with content in read operations.

Type:

set[str]

git_ops.get_repo_path(user_id, repo_name)[소스]

Get local filesystem path for a repository.

Constructs the path with security validation to prevent path traversal attacks.

매개변수:

  • user_id (str) – User’s GitHub ID

  • repo_name (str) – Repository name

반환:

Resolved path to the repository directory

반환 형식:

Path

예외 발생:

  • ValueError – If user_id or repo_name is invalid

  • ValueError – If path traversal is detected

Security:

  • Rejects path separators (/, \) in components

  • Rejects parent directory references (..)

  • Validates resolved path is within REPOS_BASE_PATH

Example:
>>> path = get_repo_path("12345", "my-repo")
>>> str(path)
'/repos/12345/my-repo'
매개변수:

  • user_id (str)

  • repo_name (str)

반환 형식:

Path

git_ops.clone_repo(clone_url, access_token, user_id, repo_name)[소스]

Clone a GitHub repository to local storage.

Clones using HTTPS with token injection for authentication. If repository already exists, returns existing path.

매개변수:

  • clone_url (str) – GitHub HTTPS clone URL

  • access_token (str) – GitHub OAuth access token

  • user_id (str) – User’s GitHub ID (for path separation)

  • repo_name (str) – Repository name

반환:

Clone operation result dictionary

반환 형식:

Dict[str, Any]

Return Dictionary Fields:

  • status (str): “success” | “exists” | “error”

  • path (str | None): Local path where repo is cloned

  • message (str): Status message

Authentication Method:

Token is injected into HTTPS URL:

https://github.com/user/repo.git
→ https://TOKEN@github.com/user/repo.git

Storage Path:

{REPOS_BASE_PATH}/{user_id}/{repo_name}/

Example:
>>> result = clone_repo(
...     "https://github.com/user/repo.git",
...     "ghp_xxxxxxxxxxxx",
...     "12345",
...     "my-repo"
... )
>>> result["status"]
'success'
>>> result["path"]
'/repos/12345/my-repo'
매개변수:

  • clone_url (str)

  • access_token (str)

  • user_id (str)

  • repo_name (str)

반환 형식:

Dict[str, Any]

경고

Access token is sanitized in error messages to prevent leakage.

git_ops.pull_repo(user_id, repo_name)[소스]

Pull latest changes for a cloned repository.

Fetches and merges changes from the origin remote using the current branch.

매개변수:

  • user_id (str) – User’s GitHub ID

  • repo_name (str) – Repository name

반환:

Pull operation result dictionary

반환 형식:

Dict[str, Any]

Return Dictionary Fields:

  • status (str): “success” | “error”

  • message (str): Result message

Example:
>>> result = pull_repo("12345", "my-repo")
>>> result["status"]
'success'
매개변수:

  • user_id (str)

  • repo_name (str)

반환 형식:

Dict[str, Any]

git_ops.list_files(user_id, repo_name, subpath='')[소스]

List files and directories in a repository.

Returns directory contents with metadata. Directories are sorted before files, alphabetically.

매개변수:

  • user_id (str) – User’s GitHub ID

  • repo_name (str) – Repository name

  • subpath (str) – Subdirectory path (empty string = root)

반환:

Directory listing result

반환 형식:

Dict[str, Any]

Return Dictionary Fields:

  • status (str): “success” | “error”

  • path (str): Requested path

  • files (list): List of file/directory objects

File Object Fields:

  • name (str): File or directory name

  • type (str): “file” | “directory”

  • size (int | None): File size in bytes (None for directories)

  • path (str): Relative path from repository root

참고

The .git directory and hidden git files are excluded.

Example:
>>> result = list_files("12345", "my-repo", "src")
>>> for f in result["files"]:
...     print(f["name"], f["type"])
components directory
App.tsx file
매개변수:

  • user_id (str)

  • repo_name (str)

  • subpath (str)

반환 형식:

Dict[str, Any]

git_ops.read_file(user_id, repo_name, file_path)[소스]

Read file content from a repository.

Returns file content for text files. Binary files return metadata only with content set to None.

매개변수:

  • user_id (str) – User’s GitHub ID

  • repo_name (str) – Repository name

  • file_path (str) – File path relative to repository root

반환:

File content result

반환 형식:

Dict[str, Any]

Return Dictionary Fields:

  • status (str): “success” | “error”

  • path (str): File path

  • binary (bool): Whether file is binary

  • size (int): File size in bytes

  • content (str | None): File content (None for binary files)

Binary Detection:

Files are considered binary if:

  1. Extension is in BINARY_EXTENSIONS set

  2. UTF-8 decoding fails

Security:

Path traversal protection ensures file is within repository.

Example:
>>> result = read_file("12345", "my-repo", "README.md")
>>> result["binary"]
False
>>> result["content"][:50]
'# My Repository\n\nThis is a sample project...'
매개변수:

  • user_id (str)

  • repo_name (str)

  • file_path (str)

반환 형식:

Dict[str, Any]

git_ops.is_cloned(user_id, repo_name)[소스]

Check if a repository is already cloned.

Verifies the repository directory exists and contains a .git folder.

매개변수:

  • user_id (str) – User’s GitHub ID

  • repo_name (str) – Repository name

반환:

True if repository is cloned, False otherwise

반환 형식:

bool

Example:
>>> is_cloned("12345", "my-repo")
True
>>> is_cloned("12345", "not-cloned")
False
git_ops.delete_repo(user_id, repo_name)[소스]

Delete a cloned repository.

Removes the entire repository directory including all files and history.

매개변수:

  • user_id (str) – User’s GitHub ID

  • repo_name (str) – Repository name

반환:

Delete operation result

반환 형식:

Dict[str, Any]

Return Dictionary Fields:

  • status (str): “success” | “error”

  • message (str): Result message

경고

This operation is irreversible. All local changes, uncommitted work, and history will be permanently deleted.

Example:
>>> result = delete_repo("12345", "my-repo")
>>> result["status"]
'success'
매개변수:

  • user_id (str)

  • repo_name (str)

반환 형식:

Dict[str, Any]

git_ops.search_files(user_id, repo_name, query, search_content=True, max_results=50)[소스]

Search filenames and content in a repository.

Performs case-insensitive search on filenames and optionally file content. Binary files are automatically skipped for content search.

매개변수:

  • user_id (str) – User’s GitHub ID

  • repo_name (str) – Repository name

  • query (str) – Search query string

  • search_content (bool) – Whether to search file content (default: True)

  • max_results (int) – Maximum number of results to return (default: 50)

반환:

Search results

반환 형식:

Dict[str, Any]

Return Dictionary Fields:

  • status (str): “success” | “error”

  • query (str): Original search query

  • total (int): Number of results found

  • results (list): List of search result objects

Result Object Fields:

  • type (str): “filename” | “content”

  • path (str): File path relative to repo root

  • name (str): File name

  • match (str): Matched text

  • line (int | None): Line number (for content matches)

  • context (str | None): Context around match (for content matches)

Search Behavior:

  1. First searches filenames (case-insensitive)

  2. If content search enabled, searches inside text files

  3. Long context lines are truncated with ellipsis

  4. Stops when max_results is reached

Example:
>>> result = search_files("12345", "my-repo", "import", max_results=10)
>>> for r in result["results"]:
...     print(f"{r['type']}: {r['path']}:{r.get('line', '')}")
content: src/App.tsx:1
content: src/utils.ts:2
매개변수:

  • user_id (str)

  • repo_name (str)

  • query (str)

  • search_content (bool)

  • max_results (int)

반환 형식:

Dict[str, Any]

git_ops.get_commits(user_id, repo_name, max_count=50)[소스]

Get commit history for a repository.

Returns a list of commits with author information, message, and statistics.

매개변수:

  • user_id (str) – User’s GitHub ID

  • repo_name (str) – Repository name

  • max_count (int) – Maximum number of commits to return (default: 50)

반환:

Commit history result

반환 형식:

Dict[str, Any]

Return Dictionary Fields:

  • status (str): “success” | “error”

  • total (int): Number of commits returned

  • commits (list): List of commit objects

Commit Object Fields:

  • sha (str): Abbreviated commit SHA (7 characters)

  • full_sha (str): Full commit SHA (40 characters)

  • message (str): First line of commit message

  • author (str): Author name

  • author_email (str): Author email

  • date (str): Commit date (ISO 8601 format)

  • stats (dict): Commit statistics

Stats Object Fields:

  • files (int): Number of files changed

  • insertions (int): Lines added

  • deletions (int): Lines removed

Example:
>>> result = get_commits("12345", "my-repo", max_count=5)
>>> for c in result["commits"]:
...     print(f"{c['sha']} - {c['message']}")
a1b2c3d - Initial commit
e4f5g6h - Add README
매개변수:

  • user_id (str)

  • repo_name (str)

  • max_count (int)

반환 형식:

Dict[str, Any]

git_ops.get_branches(user_id, repo_name)[소스]

Get branch list for a repository.

Returns both local and remote branches. Performs a git fetch first to ensure remote branches are up to date.

매개변수:

  • user_id (str) – User’s GitHub ID

  • repo_name (str) – Repository name

반환:

Branch list result

반환 형식:

Dict[str, Any]

Return Dictionary Fields:

  • status (str): “success” | “error”

  • current_branch (str | None): Currently checked out branch

  • total (int): Total number of branches

  • branches (list): List of branch objects

Branch Object Fields:

  • name (str): Branch name

  • type (str): “local” | “remote”

  • is_current (bool): Whether this is the current branch

  • commit_sha (str): Latest commit SHA (7 characters)

  • commit_message (str): Latest commit message (first line)

Behavior:

  1. Fetches from origin remote first (may fail silently)

  2. Lists all local branches

  3. Lists remote branches not already tracked locally

  4. HEAD references are excluded

Example:
>>> result = get_branches("12345", "my-repo")
>>> result["current_branch"]
'main'
>>> for b in result["branches"]:
...     print(f"{b['name']} ({b['type']})")
main (local)
develop (local)
feature/new (remote)
매개변수:

  • user_id (str)

  • repo_name (str)

반환 형식:

Dict[str, Any]

git_ops.checkout_branch(user_id, repo_name, branch_name)[소스]

Checkout (switch to) a branch.

Switches the working directory to the specified branch. If the branch only exists on remote, creates a local tracking branch.

매개변수:

  • user_id (str) – User’s GitHub ID

  • repo_name (str) – Repository name

  • branch_name (str) – Branch name to checkout

반환:

Checkout operation result

반환 형식:

Dict[str, Any]

Return Dictionary Fields:

  • status (str): “success” | “error”

  • message (str): Result message

  • current_branch (str): Current branch after checkout

Checkout Behavior:

  1. If local branch exists → checkout directly

  2. If only remote exists → create local branch from origin/{branch}

  3. If neither exists → error

Example:
>>> result = checkout_branch("12345", "my-repo", "develop")
>>> result["status"]
'success'
>>> result["current_branch"]
'develop'
매개변수:

  • user_id (str)

  • repo_name (str)

  • branch_name (str)

반환 형식:

Dict[str, Any]

참고

Uncommitted changes may prevent checkout. Handle errors appropriately.
